general_advisory: In the current scenario of weather in the state, farmers have to manage their agriculture for the next two weeks. The following recommendations are made: - n lines of general advisory.

advisory: Maintain adequate humidity for paddy cultivation.
Remove unwanted plants from the field for seed harvesting.
Control False Smut Disease with recommended pesticides.
Sow recommended wheat varieties between 25 October and 0 November.
Sow barley varieties between 20 October and 0 November.
Sow recommended varieties for mustard cultivation.
Sow Rabi maize hybrids and complex varieties.
Sow early high-sugar varieties of sugarcane.
Prepare fields and use recommended fertilizers.
Sow gram varieties by the second or third week of October.
Prepare for main potato crop from 15 October with recommended varieties.
Sow nursery for Rabi vegetables and transplant seedlings.
Harvest and manage fruit crops as per recommended practices.
